actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to provide for the withdrawal of lands for the Village of Klukwan, Alaska.

summary.text: Amends the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to direct the Secretary of the Interior to withdraw 70,000 acres of public lands in order that the Village Corporation for the Villiage of Klukwan may select 23,040 acres.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to provide for the withdrawal of lands for the Village of Klukwan, Alaska.
